title: Meet the J-Pop 'idol' robot that dances and dresses up just for you
text:
Meet the J-Pop 'idol' robot that dances and dresses up just for you 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
This robot is a better dancer than half of the Japanese pop idol groups it's trying to emulate. While we're not going to torture ourselves (...
